Table of Contents

Namespace MdFilesMerger.Domain.Abstract

Interfaces

IDirectory

Base interface for all directory or file related models.

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory
Implementations: BaseDirectory, MdFile, RelativeFile, IgnoredFile, MainDirectory, MergedFile, SelectedFile

IEditFile

Base interface for models related with .md files involved in the merge (merged and selected file models).

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory -> IEditFile
Implementations: SelectedFile, MergedFile

IItem

Base interface for all models.

Inheritance: IItem
Implementations: BaseItem, BaseDirectory, MdFile, RelativeFile, IgnoredFile, MainDirectory, MenuAction, MergedFile, SelectedFile, User

IMainDirectory

Interface of main directory model

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory -> IMainDirectory
Implementations: MainDirectory

IMenuAction

Interface for menu action item.

Inheritance: IItem -> IMenuAction
Implementations: MenuAction

IMergedFile

Interface for merged file model.

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory -> IEditFile -> IMergedFile
Implementations: MergedFile

IRelativeFile

Interface for models associated with the IMainDirectory instance (selected and ignored file models).

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory -> IRelativeFile
Implementations: RelativeFile, IgnoredFile, SelectedFile

ISelectedFile

Interface of selected file model.

Inheritance: IItem -> IDirectory -> IEditFile -> ISelectedFile
IItem -> IDirectory -> IRelativeFile -> ISelectedFile
Implementations: SelectedFile

IUser

Interface of user model.

Inheritance: IItem -> IUser
Implementations: User
